author: deweese
msg: 1) Included Tonny's support for preserveAspectRatio DOM methods.
2) Some improvements for Kerning in SVG Font (faster)
3) ttf2svg now supports 'auto ranging' so it looks at the font
to decide what to output.
4) All Object.wait calls are now in while loops to prevent spurious wakeups.
Obtained from:
Submitted by:
Reviewed by:

author: vhardy
msg: Added ISO reference because of documentation's character.ent file in xdocs

author: vhardy
msg: Added ASL 2.0 copyright header to remaining documentation files following Stefano Mazzochi's email to the pmc@xml.a.pache.org mailing list on August 28 2004.

author: deweese
msg: 1) ScriptFactorys now loaded via Services interface.
2) JavaDoc will now reference W3 and JDK docs
3) SAXSVGDocumentFactory now uses getResource as Stream instead of
Resource bundles to get dtdids properties (doesn't really need to
be localized now does it...).
4) DrawImage now defaults color model to sRGB_Unpre if the destination
doesn't include alpha.
5) CmapFormat4 now clips charCode 0->65534.
6) Services interface now uses a list instead of vector.
PR:
Obtained from:
Submitted by:
Reviewed by:

author: deweese
msg: 1) Fixed Bug 28785 - 'a' element not clickable with namespace prefix.
Thanks Richard
2) Bug 29110 - Anti-aliased clips (hqClip patch).  This can be
disabled by setting the transcoding hint to
vector or print (so content doesn't get rasterized).
3) Bug 30584 - Concurrent Modification believed fixed (couldn't get
test case to fail after fix).
4) Bug 29891 - Rasterizer problem if w/h == viewBox w/h
5) DOM will now detect when the child passed to insert/remove
node is not the child of the node insert/remove is called on.
6) No more 'flicker' when panning a dynamic document.
Not 100% happy with solution (it looks like a bit of a hack).
Obtained from:
Submitted by:
Reviewed by:
